data: A Merchant travelling into a foreign Country, fell extreamly in Love with a young Lady; but being a stranger in that Nation, and beneath her, both in Birth and Wealth, he could have but little hopes of obtaining his desire; however his Love growing more and more vehement upon him, even to the slighting of all difficulties, he resolved at last to Steal her away;
The Description of a New World, Called the Blazing-World
browsing: literature|browsing: science-fiction & fantasy|browsing: fiction|category: science-fiction & fantasy|category: novels|category: british literature
